public abstract class AppointmentQuery extends Object implements AppointmentDAO
Project: C195Assessment Package: java.Queries // SQL Queries for appointments

User: Karson Gover Date: 02/08/2023 Time: 4:22 PM

Created with IntelliJ IDEA

This class holds all SQL database queries for appointments

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      This SQL query inserts an appointment into the database
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object that gets inserted into the database
      Returns:
      Returns an int from the executeUpdate() method, returns amount of rows affected by the query
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Query

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      This SQL query updates an appointment in the database
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object that gets updated from the database
      Returns:
      Returns an int from the executeUpdate() method, returns amount of rows affected by the query
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Query

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      This SQL query deletes an appointment from the database
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The appointment ID the query uses to search for the appointment
      Returns:
      Returns an int from the executeUpdate() method, returns amount of rows affected by the query
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Query

      Parameters:

    • getCustomerAppointmentTimes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<CustomerAppointmentTimes> getCustomerAppointmentTimes(int customerID) throws SQLException
      This SQL query gets all appointment times from the specified customer. It's used to check overlaps when adding an appointment
      Parameters:
      customerID - The customer ID that is used to search for the customer in the database
      Returns:
      ObservableList(CustomerAppointmentTimes)
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Query

    • getCustomerAppointmentTimes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<CustomerAppointmentTimes> getCustomerAppointmentTimes(int customerID, int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      This SQL query gets all appointment times from the specified customer. It's used to check overlaps when updating an appointment. The appointment ID is a parameter to prevent the query from including the appointment being updated. Without it, the appointment times would always overlap
      Parameters:
      customerID - The customer ID that is used to search for the customer in the database
      appointmentID - The appointment ID that is used to search for the appointment being updated, to exclude it from the query
      Returns:
      ObservableList(CustomerAppointmentTimes)
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Query
